scripts.dev: rm -fr ./build/ && mkdir -p ./build && npm pack --pack-destination ./build && mv ./build/*.tgz ./build/package.tgz && tar -xvzf ./build/package.tgz -C ./build && rm -fr ../react-native-zoom-us-test/node_modules/react-native-zoom-us/* && cp -R build/package/* ../react-native-zoom-us-test/node_modules/react-native-zoom-us/
